LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkScythe.label: Dark Matter Scythe
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkScythe.description: Ever wished you could become the embodiment of Death? Well wait no more, using this weapon with the Dark Matter Belt will make you unstoppable.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkScythe.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkScythe.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkSpear.label: Dark Matter Spear
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkSpear.description: When it comes to dealing death, some prefer do it at a distance of greater saftey yet close enough to see the fear in their prey's eyes.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkSpear.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkSpear.tools.edge.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkSword.label: Dark Matter Sword
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkSword.description: Where a scythe is a weapon that embodies a reaper of death, a sword is man's embodiement of death to his fellows.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkSword.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkSword.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_DarkSword.tools.edge.label: edge
